title: Topic 002 Question 029
body: You have an Azure IoT solution that includes an Azure IoT hub and a Device Provisioning Service instance.
You need to prevent the stolen devices from connecting to the IoT solution. The solution must prevent the devices from re-enrollment and must be implemented as soon as possible.
options: Delete the devices from the IoT hub.
Delete the device enrollments from the Device Provisioning Service.
Disable the devices in the IoT hub and delete from the IoT hub.
Disable the device enrollments in the Device Provisioning Service and delete the devices from the IoT hub.
